com.okta.spring.oauth

Class ConfigurableAccessTokenConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.DefaultAccessTokenConverter
      • com.okta.spring.oauth.ConfigurableAccessTokenConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.AccessTokenConverter

    public class ConfigurableAccessTokenConverter
extends org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.DefaultAccessTokenConverter
    Adjusts the default map of JWT access token claims based on a configurable scope and role claim field.
